stimulusHtml: Like the Fengxian Temple that is part of the Longmen caves, Todai-ji includes

features.html: © Vanni Archive/Art Resource, NY

choicesHtml: paintings of celestial beings on the walls and ceilings
fierce guardian figures created to protect the complex’s sacred space
rock-cut niches used for individual study and meditation
large-scale relief carvings depicting life in the imperial court
